'''David Nisshagen''' was the Director of Internal New Games at [[Mojang Studios]], who worked on ''[[Minecraft Dungeons]]''.

He left Mojang in 2025.<ref>https://www.linkedin.com/in/david-nisshagen-9447002/</ref>
